text:
Hello there!

This is a friendly reminder that *there are only 24 hours remaining to submit a case study to our <https://cmshub.devpost.com/|website contest>.*

Creating an entry based on the best CMS Hub project you've already completed should only take an hour or two, so there is still time to participate.

We've got some cool prizes and dev swag to give out - so make sure you get in on the action!
Shame the revamped version of our client site wont be ready for a couple of days
